parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post may not be officially sanctioned electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Forța Dreptei," a political party participating in the parliamentary elections.  This directly refers to a candidate (or group of candidates) participating in the elections, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. It's not a private message; therefore, it addresses the wide population, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support "Forța Dreptei." The phrase "Susțineți tinerii, votați Forța Dreptei! Trimite în Parlament oameni cinstiți!" directly calls for votes for this party. This clearly aims to influence the electoral outcome, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a clear endorsement of a political party, not an informative or analytical piece. It does not adhere to journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, presented as a paid advertisement.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>571327662183867</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific parliamentary candidate (Forța Dreptei), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support that party.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic. While the absence of a CMF number might raise some doubt, the other factors strongly suggest it's electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Forța Dreptei</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>FD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Florin - Emanuel Dobria, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 571327662183867) cu conținut electoral, care îndeamnă la votarea partidului Forța Dreptei, folosind fraze precum „Susțineți tinerii, votați Forța Dreptei! Trimite în Parlament oameni cinstiți!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea partidului menționat. Postarea, fiind o reclamă plătită pe o platformă publică, se adresează unui public larg și depășește limitele activității jurnalistice, constituind astfel material de propagandă electorală interzis după încheierea perioadei de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
